hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT MIN(r.startTime) AS min FROM AQD.dbo.Result r inner join AQD.dbo.Observation o on r.observationId=o.Id inner join AQD.dbo.SPProcess pro on o.processId=pro.Id WHERE pro.inspireId = :offering
SELECT MAX(r.endTime) AS max FROM AQD.dbo.Result r inner join AQD.dbo.Observation o on r.observationId=o.Id inner join AQD.dbo.SPProcess pro on o.processId=pro.Id WHERE pro.inspireId = :offering
SELECT MIN(r.startTime) AS min FROM AQD.dbo.Result r inner join AQD.dbo.Observation o on r.observationId=o.Id inner join AQD.dbo.SPProcess pro on o.processId=pro.Id WHERE pro.inspireId = :offering
SELECT MAX(r.endTime) AS max FROM AQD.dbo.Result r inner join AQD.dbo.Observation o on r.observationId=o.Id inner join AQD.dbo.SPProcess pro on o.processId=pro.Id WHERE pro.inspireId = :offering

SELECT pro.inspireId as [off], MIN(r.startTime) as minPhenStart, MAX(r.startTime) as maxPhenStart, MAX(r.endTime) as maxPhenEnd, MIN(r.startTime) as minRes, MAX(r.endTime) as maxRes FROM AQD.dbo.Result r inner join AQD.dbo.Observation o on r.observationId=o.Id inner join AQD.dbo.SPProcess pro on o.processId=pro.Id GROUP BY pro.inspireId
